channel.title: Why mopar is really the best (the forums)
channel.description: ive been on A LOT of forums for games and i have to say, this one so far is the best. on the last forum i was on i was teased and cussed out a lot, and on every single forum (sep this 1) it has taken days to get replies on all the things I posted, but here im getting 4,5, or 6 replies a day! and MOST of you all are pretty nice :)

item.title: Why mopar is really the best (the forums)
item.dc:creator: @C11 C
item.description:
@C11 wrote:

so true, mopar owns

Read full topic
item.source: Why mopar is really the best (the forums)

item.title: Why mopar is really the best (the forums)
item.dc:creator: @alex4ever alex4ever
item.description:
@alex4ever wrote:

[quote=“jme_009, post:21, topic:108936”][quote author=crazycam10 link=topic=155876.msg1469962#msg1469962 date=1181611106]
Mopar Is The Shit Forums Lol, Every Post You Make Your Sure To Get Flamed
[/quote]

That’s funny because I don’t get flamed :S

Maybe it’s because I don’t capitalize the first letter of each word? I seriously can’t even comprhend why people want to do that. It’s so hard to read, and takes much longer to type. That wasn’t a personal attack or anything, just a rant lol.

Well anyways, I’d say these forums are far from the best, but you’ll fit in good with the members as long as you are able to use common sense.[/quote]i have never been flamed and when i see people getting flamed it about guess what makeing all to every lettle or first letter in sentes capitle lol.

Read full topic
item.source: Why mopar is really the best (the forums)

item.title: Why mopar is really the best (the forums)
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

crazycam10:

Mopar Is The Shit Forums Lol, Every Post You Make Your Sure To Get Flamed

That’s funny because I don’t get flamed :S

Maybe it’s because I don’t capitalize the first letter of each word? I seriously can’t even comprehend why people want to do that. It’s so hard to read, and takes much longer to type. That wasn’t a personal attack or anything, just a rant lol.

Well anyways, I’d say these forums are far from the best, but you’ll fit in good with the members as long as you are able to use common sense.

Read full topic
item.source: Why mopar is really the best (the forums)

item.title: Why mopar is really the best (the forums)
item.dc:creator: @alex4ever alex4ever
item.description:
@alex4ever wrote:

[quote=“The Un-Named, post:19, topic:108936”][quote author=crazycam10 link=topic=155876.msg1469962#msg1469962 date=1181611106]
Mopar Is The Shit Forums Lol, Every Post You Make Your Sure To Get Flamed
[/quote]

No, that isn’t the problem, the problem is people won’t PM us(GMods) about it and it gets lost in the spammed up reports of “z0mg join dis server(yes I’ve had that message once)”.[/quote]lol that or u can just wait for g mod or mod to see him and lock it just leave it so you don’t get in truble lol

Read full topic

item.title: Why mopar is really the best (the forums)
item.dc:creator: @Gotta_Catch_Them_All Gotta Catch Them All
item.description:
@Gotta_Catch_Them_All wrote:

[quote=“crazycam10, post:15, topic:108936”][quote author=Speljohan link=topic=155876.msg1469981#msg1469981 date=1181611301]

Mopar Is The Shit Forums Lol, Every Post You Make Your Sure To Get Flamed

Maybe that’s because of the following:

  1. You are asking stupid questions that anyone can google?
  2. You are being annoying on the forums?
  3. You are starting every word with a big letter, and forget about punctation?
    [/quote]

Dude Im No Newb And Tbh I Hate Grammar… People Will Flame You Anyways[/quote]

Haven’t we had this chat about removing the shift key from your keyboard?

Read full topic

item.title: Why mopar is really the best (the forums)
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

tryed to hack it:

on the last forum i was on i was teased and cussed out a lot

Wont take long before you start getting ‘cussed’ at.

Mitb has a reputation for that, whoever Moparscape is one were you get moaned at or ‘cussed’ at for saying something like ‘could be improved’ they take it offensively and start flaming you.

I like these forums alot, but yes like all forums they do have their faults.

Read full topic
